) VALUES (

mapper.select: SELECT id as id, express_name as expressName, express_type as expressType, express_no as expressNo, express_pic as expressPic, province_code as provinceCode, province as province, city_code as cityCode, city as city, area_code as areaCode, area as area, detail_adress as detailAdress, link_name as linkName, link_mobile as linkMobile FROM hy_express WHERE order_id=#{orderNo} order by id desc
mapper.update: update hy_express set express_pic= '' where order_id=#{orderNo} AND express_pic = {imageUrl}
mapper.sql: id, express_type, express_name, express_no, express_pic, province, city, area, detail_adress, link_name, link_mobile, order_id, user_id
